metadata.title: Connectyle Winter Trapper Hat for Men Trooper Russian Hat Ear Flaps Ushanka Hat
features: 100% Premium cotton outer shell combined with soft plush inner lining,effective against cold weather and comfortable to wear
The winter trapper hat with large warm earflaps and super-soft plush inner lining, great coverage for head, ears and neck,effective against cold weather and comfortable to wear
One size fits most head circumference 58-60cm/22.8"-23.6", and the adjustable chin strap makes the hat more fitting
The hat is really thick and durable, it's windproof, warm and toasty, necessary accessories in cold winter
Great for outdoor sports and activities,such as skiing,snowboarding,hiking,hunting,trapping and any more others
Recommend hand washing and spot cleaning for best results,do not use chemical detergent to wash
description: Connectyle chunky trapper hat main material is cotton,and super-soft plush inner lining.One size fits for 56-60 cm/22.0-23.5 inch.Functional winter hat perfect for any outdoor activities such as skiing,snowboarding,hiking,hunting,trapping and any more others.

title: Unigear winter trapper hat for men women with mask
